IDegenerusCoinModule","name":"coinContract","type":"address"}],"name":"payDailyJackpot","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"traitId","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"randWord","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"ethPool","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"contract IDegenerusCoinModule","name":"coinContract","type":"address"}],"name":"payExterminationJackpot","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"paidEth","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"rngWord","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"effectiveWei","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"contract IDegenerusCoinModule","name":"coinContract","type":"address"}],"name":"payLevelJackpot","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"randWord","type":"uint256"}],"name":"payMapJackpot","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint32","name":"writesBudget","type":"uint32"}],"name":"processMapBatch","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"finished","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Burnie Degenerus","details":"ARCHITECTURE NOTES:      - This contract is ONLY meant to be invoked via `delegatecall` from the main game contract.      - Storage layout inherits from `DegenerusGameStorage` to ensure slot alignment with the parent.      - All external functions lack access modifiers intentionally; the parent contract controls access.      - DO NOT deploy this contract standalone or call it directly\u2014state would be written to the        module's own storage rather than the game's.      JACKPOT FLOW OVERVIEW:      1. `calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot` \u2014 Computes pool splits (reward vs prize vs level jackpot) at level start.      2. `payLevelJackpot` \u2014 Distributes the level jackpot after purchases close.      3. `payDailyJackpot` \u2014 Handles early-burn rewards during purchase phase and rolling dailies at EOL.      4. `payDailyMapJackpot` \u2014 Separate MAP ticket draw after daily jackpot settlement.      5. `payExterminationJackpot` / `payCarryoverExterminationJackpot` \u2014 Trait-specific payouts during burns.      6. `processMapBatch` \u2014 Batched airdrop processing with gas budgeting to stay block-safe.      FUND ACCOUNTING:      - ETH flows through `rewardPool`, `currentPrizePool`, `nextPrizePool`, `claimablePool`, `bondPool`.      - The solo bucket in any distribution absorbs remainder to prevent dust accumulation.      - `claimableWinnings` tracks per-player ETH; `claimablePool` is the aggregate liability.      RANDOMNESS:      - All entropy originates from VRF words passed by the parent contract.      - Internal `_entropyStep` provides deterministic derivation for sub-selections.      - Winner selection intentionally allows duplicates (more tickets = more chances).","events":{"PlayerCredited(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Wei credited.","player":"The original winner (ticket holder).","recipient":"The address receiving the credit (same as player in current impl)."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,address)":{"details":"This is the \"budgeting\" function that determines how ETH flows between pools:      FLOW:      1. Merge nextPrizePool into currentPrizePool.      2. Compute rewardPool retention % based on level and RNG (higher at end of 100-level bands).      3. Adjust retention based on flip activity trends.      4. Split remainder into level jackpot (20-40%) and daily jackpot base.      5. On level % 100, optionally add yield surplus (stETH appreciation) to rewardPool.","params":{"lvl":"Current game level.","rngWord":"VRF entropy for percentage rolls.","stethAddr":"stETH contract address for balance checks."},"returns":{"effectiveWei":"ETH allocated for the level jackpot."}},"payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uint256,address)":{"details":"After a trait is exterminated, this rewards players who already hold tickets for the      upcoming level. Funded from rewardPool at 1% (scaled by level position in 100-level band).      Also triggers a quest roll for the jackpot day.","params":{"coinContract":"Coin module for quest rolls.","lvl":"Target level for ticket lookup (typically current level + 1).","randWord":"VRF entropy for winner selection.","traitId":"The exterminated trait whose holders are rewarded."},"returns":{"paidEth":"Actual ETH distributed (debited from rewardPool)."}},"payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,address)":{"details":"Called by the parent game contract via delegatecall. Two distinct paths:      DAILY PATH (isDaily=true):      - Distributes escalating slice of dailyJackpotBase to trait-based winners.      - Seeds next level's carryover jackpot from rewardPool.      - Queues MAP ticket distribution for a follow-up tx (if budgeted).      - Increments jackpotCounter; clears dailyBurnCount on completion.      EARLY-BURN PATH (isDaily=false):      - Triggered during purchase phase when early burns occur.      - Pays a rewardPool-funded slice once per week, starting 7 days after purchase phase begins        (1.5% of rewardPool; ~1% MAP, ~0.5% ETH).      - Coin jackpots pay on non-ETH days, sized from lastPrizePool.","params":{"coinContract":"Coin module for COIN payouts and quest rolls.","isDaily":"True for scheduled daily jackpot, false for early-burn jackpot.","lvl":"Current game level.","randWord":"VRF entropy for winner selection and trait derivation."}},"payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Called when a trait is being exterminated. All four bucket slots use the SAME trait ID      so that only holders of the exterminated trait can win. Uses daily jackpot share/bucket      sizing but draws exclusively from the single trait's ticket pool.","params":{"coinContract":"Coin module (unused for ETH-only extermination jackpots).","ethPool":"ETH allocated for this extermination jackpot.","lvl":"Current game level.","randWord":"VRF entropy for winner selection.","traitId":"The trait being exterminated (0-255)."},"returns":{"paidEth":"Actual ETH distributed to winners."}},"payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"The flagship jackpot with 60/13/13/14 share distribution. Uses the \"main\" flow which      supports solo bond purchases (25% for single winners) and large-bucket bond distribution.      Unpaid ETH rolls into currentPrizePool for daily jackpots.","params":{"coinContract":"Coin module for quest rolls.","effectiveWei":"Total ETH allocated for the level jackpot (from calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot).","lvl":"Current game level.","rngWord":"VRF entropy for trait and winner selection."}},"payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256)":{"details":"Branches based on mapJackpotType:      - DAILY (1): Uses burn-weighted traits, splits winners across current + carryover levels.      - PURCHASE (2): Uses random traits, single draw for current level only.","params":{"lvl":"Current game level.","randWord":"VRF entropy for winner selection."}},"processMapBatch(uint32)":{"details":"Called iteratively until all pending mints are processed. Uses a writes budget      to stay within block gas limits. The first batch in a new airdrop round is      scaled down by 35% to account for cold storage access costs.      GAS BUDGETING:      - Each mint requires ~2 SSTOREs (trait ticket + count update).      - Budget defaults to WRITES_BUDGET_SAFE (780) if not specified.      - Minimum budget is WRITES_BUDGET_MIN (8) to ensure progress.","params":{"writesBudget":"Maximum SSTORE writes allowed this call (0 = use default)."},"returns":{"finished":"True if all pending map mints have been fully processed."}}},"stateVariables":{"BOND_BPS_DAILY":{"details":"Bond BPS for daily/early-burn jackpots (disabled = 0)."},"CARRYOVER_3D4_SALT":{"details":"Domain separator for carryover 3d4 dice roll derivation."},"CARRYOVER_BONUS_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for carryover bonus roll derivation."},"COIN_JACKPOT_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for coin jackpot entropy derivation."},"DAILY_ETH_MAX_WINNERS":{"details":"Maximum total ETH winners across daily + carryover jackpots."},"DAILY_JACKPOT_BPS_0":{"details":"Per-jackpot basis points of dailyJackpotBase. Sums to 9156 bps (~91.56%).      Roughly 2\u00d7 growth from first (610) to last (1225) to reward patience."},"DAILY_JACKPOT_MAP_BPS":{"details":"Portion of daily jackpot ETH converted to MAP tickets (20%)."},"DAILY_JACKPOT_SHARES_PACKED":{"details":"Daily jackpot trait bucket shares: 2000 bps each \u00d7 4 = 8000 bps (remaining 20% absorbed by solo bucket)."},"DAILY_MAP_MAX_WINNERS":{"details":"Max total MAP winners per MAP jackpot draw.      250 winners \u00d7 ~54k gas = ~13.5M gas worst case (under 16M limit)."},"DAILY_MAP_NEXT_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for dailyMapJackpot carryover draw entropy."},"DAILY_MAP_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for dailyMapJackpot draw entropy."},"DAILY_REWARD_JACKPOT_MAP_BPS":{"details":"Portion of reward-pool-funded daily jackpot ETH converted to MAP tickets (50%)."},"DAILY_SOLO_BOND_BPS":{"details":"Bond purchase percentage for solo daily winners (50%)."},"DEGENERATE_ENTROPY_CHECK_VALUE":{"details":"Sentinel value for degenerate entropy detection (Easter egg: 420)."},"EARLY_BURN_MAP_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for early-burn MAP draw entropy."},"JACKPOT_LEVEL_CAP":{"details":"Maximum number of daily jackpots per level before forcing level transition."},"JACKPOT_MAX_WINNERS":{"details":"Maximum total winners per jackpot payout (including solo bucket)."},"JACKPOT_RESET_TIME":{"details":"Seconds offset from midnight UTC for daily jackpot reset boundary (22:57 UTC)."},"JACKPOT_SCALE_BASE_BPS":{"details":"Scale values in basis points."},"JACKPOT_SCALE_FIRST_WEI":{"details":"First scale target (2x) by this pool size."},"JACKPOT_SCALE_MIN_WEI":{"details":"Minimum pool size before scaling kicks in."},"JACKPOT_SCALE_SECOND_WEI":{"details":"Second scale target (4x) by this pool size; cap beyond."},"LEVEL_JACKPOT_MAP_BPS":{"details":"Portion of level jackpot ETH converted to MAP tickets (20%)."},"LEVEL_JACKPOT_SHARES_PACKED":{"details":"Level jackpot trait bucket shares packed into 64 bits: [6000, 1333, 1333, 1334] = 10000 bps.      With rotation, the 60% share is assigned to the solo (1-winner) bucket."},"LEVEL_JACKPOT_SOLO_BOND_BPS":{"details":"Bond purchase percentage for solo level jackpot winners (25%)."},"LEVEL_MAP_TAG":{"details":"Domain separator for level jackpot MAP draw entropy."},"MAIN_LARGE_BUCKET_BOND_WINNERS":{"details":"Number of bond winners per base large bucket (scaled by bucket size)."},"MAIN_LARGE_BUCKET_SIZE":{"details":"Base bucket size for \"large bucket\" bond winner selection."},"MAP_JACKPOT_DAILY":{"details":"Daily MAP jackpot pending (burn phase)."},"MAP_JACKPOT_NONE":{"details":"No MAP jackpot pending."},"MAP_JACKPOT_PURCHASE":{"details":"Purchase-phase MAP jackpot pending (level/early-burn)."},"MAP_LCG_MULT":{"details":"LCG multiplier for deterministic trait generation (Knuth's MMIX constant)."},"MAX_BUCKET_WINNERS":{"details":"Max winners per single trait bucket (must fit in uint8 for _randTraitTicket).      Set to 250 to allow all MAP winners in single trait if others are empty."},"PURCHASE_REWARD_JACKPOT_MAP_BPS":{"details":"Portion of purchase-phase reward-pool jackpots converted to MAP tickets (~2/3)."},"WRITES_BUDGET_MIN":{"details":"Minimum writes budget to ensure progress even with very low caps."},"WRITES_BUDGET_SAFE":{"details":"Default SSTORE budget for processMapBatch to stay safely under 15M gas."}},"title":"DegenerusGameJackpotModule","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"MapJackpotPending()":[{"notice":"A MAP jackpot is already queued."}]},"events":{"PlayerCredited(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when ETH is credited to a player's claimable balance."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Computes and applies prize pool splits at the start of a new level's jackpot phase."},"payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Pays a post-extermination carryover jackpot for the NEXT level's ticket holders."},"payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Pays early-burn jackpots during purchase phase OR rolling daily jackpots at level end."},"payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Pays a trait-restricted jackpot during extermination phase."},"payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Pays the level jackpot at the end of the purchase phase."},"payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256)":{"notice":"Pays the queued MAP jackpot (daily or purchase) in a separate transaction."},"processMapBatch(uint32)":{"notice":"Processes a batch of pending map mints with gas-bounded iteration."}},"notice":"Delegate-called module that hosts `DegenerusGame`.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/modules/DegenerusGameJackpotModule.sol":"DegenerusGameJackpotModule"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"details":{"constantOptimizer":true,"cse":true,"deduplicate":true,"inliner":true,"jumpdestRemover":true,"orderLiterals":true,"peephole":true,"simpleCounterForLoopUncheckedIncrement":true,"yul":true,"yulDetails":{"optimizerSteps":"dhfoDgvulfnTUtnIf:fDnTOcmuO","stackAllocation":true}},"runs":200},"remappings":[":@arbitrum/=node_modules/@arbitrum/",":@chainlink/=node_modules/@chainlink/",":@eth-optimism/=node_modules/@chainlink/contracts/node_modules/@eth-optimism/",":@offchainlabs/=node_modules/@offchainlabs/",":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":@scroll-tech/=node_modules/@scroll-tech/",":@zksync/=node_modules/@zksync/",":erc721a/=node_modules/erc721a/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/",":solady/=node_modules/solady/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/ContractAddresses.sol":{"keccak256":"0x773c919574c05ba618701fedbdae4175a3605a5847981e752037c2278a0c06ed","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d53147d50f52792abe4b0a369cfd5a0f17e0ad73d2ef9be739520b6771870f79","dweb:/ipfs/QmYRCpkAjDpvN23n3jyzt2QtwgdDmVB7WT7X1ch6BCH2UV"]},"contracts/DegenerusTraitUtils.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdc2c46504f4394dc5fdacae344ef758d336a602928be7a2e8da63948eeaf3bdc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8892bc9959ef3588721e88dad589b9dbc9f549234af19320be06521b10bd5377","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf1Y81X46oc18Ceer2ixeu58gsrGgGgVd9qGkKMFcx4Xt"]},"contracts/interfaces/DegenerusGameModuleInterfaces.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2cce73e9b967eab0a785aa1b8fb16b894b3735770f77dbe47e04d7c08f81639b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b9aaf8031f1b806a930a506ce6697ad110f3af096e103f4846a998d76883d694","dweb:/ipfs/QmaCfQsBTNQ6fTMgTAXm4qTBU3amXMgiHVzUwi5YPSGgP1"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusBondsJackpot.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3ca866bdd1faa0b74f90e8ce537f672cfeacb6ce155923970c71e5ee4d8b7c80","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b2b11819261df0c8b59ff196bbdcc84fe4f19a521b2bba97ffd39df2325bb904","dweb:/ipfs/QmU8pFh196YFDhZCpQ4rSnVUUA6EAVoFHnVLbvLrq5qnWF"]},"contracts/interfaces/IStETH.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5a70bd9c7f58e2ffd8bde4444d358be2a58b40bb49282673591efcbf3d5a8dc7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a1e32863741f5e7cb909d8b2fbd48f68d1d852f306b7736595becb774883a50","dweb:/ipfs/Qmcnh8Ujdb8zkWReUXADrfx4yopkB3YHj7dPm59iwozoFj"]},"contracts/modules/DegenerusGameJackpotModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e540656514bb585baf6f4c4f5b9a2f2ba45e8a0f707726593a52dc6e7b98428","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7e5eb2886b3985c5d6778110ca029a1c15f118f716f9a24077e4361bd7576ed3","dweb:/ipfs/QmdQ14StgCL1Mj5rvaL4qGTavwP1zTcWv9rWv5mDtcA1dH"]},"contracts/storage/DegenerusGameStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9b320af7aaad31d3f5e13494556defe6f486dcf1a3671bd00a968ea85722c495","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7fa37b908354a14d763c71ed17ec8f16e79faa349b2fcf0dc37e3a5f164f74c","dweb:/ipfs/QmaU1JST3a9a38zPJrghofJrW8n6AtNLkQR7xvU5VNQ5yU"]}},"version":1}

calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint.details: This is the "budgeting" function that determines how ETH flows between pools:      FLOW:      1. Merge nextPrizePool into currentPrizePool.      2. Compute rewardPool retention % based on level and RNG (higher at end of 100-level bands).      3. Adjust retention based on flip activity trends.      4. Split remainder into level jackpot (20-40%) and daily jackpot base.      5. On level % 100, optionally add yield surplus (stETH appreciation) to rewardPool.

params.stethAddr: stETH contract address for balance checks.

returns.effectiveWei: ETH allocated for the level jackpot.

payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,.details: After a trait is exterminated, this rewards players who already hold tickets for the      upcoming level. Funded from rewardPool at 1% (scaled by level position in 100-level band).      Also triggers a quest roll for the jackpot day.

params.lvl: Target level for ticket lookup (typically current level + 1).
params.traitId: The exterminated trait whose holders are rewarded.

payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,addr.details: Called by the parent game contract via delegatecall. Two distinct paths:      DAILY PATH (isDaily=true):      - Distributes escalating slice of dailyJackpotBase to trait-based winners.      - Seeds next level's carryover jackpot from rewardPool.      - Queues MAP ticket distribution for a follow-up tx (if budgeted).      - Increments jackpotCounter; clears dailyBurnCount on completion.      EARLY-BURN PATH (isDaily=false):      - Triggered during purchase phase when early burns occur.      - Pays a rewardPool-funded slice once per week, starting 7 days after purchase phase begins        (1.5% of rewardPool; ~1% MAP, ~0.5% ETH).      - Coin jackpots pay on non-ETH days, sized from lastPrizePool.

params.coinContract: Coin module for COIN payouts and quest rolls.
params.isDaily: True for scheduled daily jackpot, false for early-burn jackpot.
params.randWord: VRF entropy for winner selection and trait derivation.

payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uin.details: Called when a trait is being exterminated. All four bucket slots use the SAME trait ID      so that only holders of the exterminated trait can win. Uses daily jackpot share/bucket      sizing but draws exclusively from the single trait's ticket pool.

params.coinContract: Coin module (unused for ETH-only extermination jackpots).
params.ethPool: ETH allocated for this extermination jackpot.

payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,a.details: The flagship jackpot with 60/13/13/14 share distribution. Uses the "main" flow which      supports solo bond purchases (25% for single winners) and large-bucket bond distribution.      Unpaid ETH rolls into currentPrizePool for daily jackpots.

params.effectiveWei: Total ETH allocated for the level jackpot (from calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot).
params.rngWord: VRF entropy for trait and winner selection.

payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256).details: Branches based on mapJackpotType:      - DAILY (1): Uses burn-weighted traits, splits winners across current + carryover levels.      - PURCHASE (2): Uses random traits, single draw for current level only.

processMapBatch(uint32).details: Called iteratively until all pending mints are processed. Uses a writes budget      to stay within block gas limits. The first batch in a new airdrop round is      scaled down by 35% to account for cold storage access costs.      GAS BUDGETING:      - Each mint requires ~2 SSTOREs (trait ticket + count update).      - Budget defaults to WRITES_BUDGET_SAFE (780) if not specified.      - Minimum budget is WRITES_BUDGET_MIN (8) to ensure progress.

params.writesBudget: Maximum SSTORE writes allowed this call (0 = use default).

returns.finished: True if all pending map mints have been fully processed.

calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint.notice: Computes and applies prize pool splits at the start of a new level's jackpot phase.

payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,.notice: Pays a post-extermination carryover jackpot for the NEXT level's ticket holders.

payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,addr.notice: Pays early-burn jackpots during purchase phase OR rolling daily jackpots at level end.

payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uin.notice: Pays a trait-restricted jackpot during extermination phase.

payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Pays the level jackpot at the end of the purchase phase.

payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256).notice: Pays the queued MAP jackpot (daily or purchase) in a separate transaction.

processMapBatch(uint32).notice: Processes a batch of pending map mints with gas-bounded iteration.
